extendedInfo.description: Easily keep track of your spending and determine what your current balance is using the Check Register phone app. Debt Consolidation Center has launched a new app that will allow you to add all your transactions in one easy place, keep track of balances and what has cleared your bank account. This application has everything you need to replace your checkbook register. The easy to use interface will allow you to quickly see your financial status while on the go.Features:â¢ A reconciliation feature will allow you to mark off transactions as they clear your bank account.â¢ Add deposits and withdrawalsâ¢ Simple reporting to show where you are spending your moneyâ¢ Easily go back and edit your transactions or delete themâ¢ Custom categories and the ability to create new ones

reviews.title: It was OK! Now not so good
reviews.comment: Stopped on a runtime error and would not let me add another transaction after I added 5 others.
reviews.author: David Douglas

reviews.title: Almost Perfect
reviews.comment: Under details the name of the transaction should be displayed, not the category. I wish I could see where the money went without having to open it and possibly editing it by accident. Also need to be able to change the date of transactions and delete categories. Switched to a better app
reviews.author: Bernadette Pierce

reviews.title: Awesome synching
reviews.comment: I love the fact when I had to get a replacement office all I had to do was re download the app and there were all my notes awesome app have been using it for almost a year
reviews.author: LaMorica Moore

reviews.title: Exactly what i was looking for!
reviews.comment: I downloaded a dozen different apps before i got to this one. For a simple register its PERFECT!!
reviews.author: Judy Miner

reviews.title: Basic checking App
reviews.comment: If you can live with the category issue, its an ok app....I deleted it when I discovered you can\'t delete or edit categories.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Reconcile needs fixing
reviews.comment: Cleared check mark button doesn\'t work but its very useful app. Please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Check mark doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I\'m having issues with the checkmark turning green..when I click on it it never does anything...otherwise this app is ok
reviews.author: Tiffany Romaine

reviews.title: Really good app
reviews.comment: This app needs one change..we need to be able to delete categories.
reviews.author: Lori Brown

reviews.title: Just So So
reviews.comment: The app is slick looking and very simple. Currently (03/15/12) there is no way to start over and no way to delete categories that were mistakenly set up. It is easy to use for the most part and the report feature is nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but could be better
reviews.comment: Need to be able to delete  catagories and also need to be able to change date of transactions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad app
reviews.comment: This app does not work on samsung galaxy 3 s.  Does not respond to touch.  Fields are chopped off on the screen as if the screen is too small.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SD Backup option
reviews.comment: . Yeah I need some kind of backup function like save it to my sd card
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Formatting is Off
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t go horizontal view so using my keyboard is out. The detailed list of transactions is an inch long and you have to scroll, plus the list only shows the category the transaction falls under, not the name you entered. Wanted to give it 2 stars but it\'s free so, that bumped it to 3 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: Good to keep track of your checking account but lacking lots of things
reviews.author: David Smidt

reviews.title: Crashed immediately
reviews.comment: Thought I\'d try it and it  stopped working within 2 minutes of starting up
reviews.author: Ali Oleson

reviews.title: Simple to use
reviews.comment: Just what I need super easy to use
reviews.author: A Google User
